General.Name: CENAQ Energy Corp. Warrant
General.Description: CENAQ Energy Corp. intends to effect a merger, capital stock exchange, asset acquisition, stock purchase, reorganization, or similar business combination with one or more businesses. It intends to identify, acquire, and operate a business in the energy industry in North America. The company was incorporated in 2020 and is based in Houston, Texas.
General.Address: 4550 Post Oak Place Drive, Houston, TX, United States, 77027
